alert.note: Alert for Richland (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 11 at 10:16PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Richland County through 1045 PM CDT... At 1015 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Richland Center, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of central Richland County, including the following locations...Sabin, Bunker Hill, Germantown, Woodstock, Gillingham, Bloom City, Yuba and Buck Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
